column4: Okay people, I'm a gamer but I'm in love with Linux. How can I make my games work on Linux? I heard of Wine, I heard of a Virtual Machine, but the first is not very compatible, and the second I hear uses only a set amount of RAM...
Hover over the speaker icon and scroll with the mouse, clayg
Yes, right click the upper panel, click add to panel
I'm thankful that I could help, so np.
